Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: Talking Books, A3 and A4 photocopier, DVDs, language courses collection and newspapers. Exhibition space and children's play equipment available. Provides 2 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office and Internet access available for public use. Library available for meetings.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-7pm, Tues & Thurs closed, Wed & Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm; one Mon in the month 5.30-6.30pm (adult reading group), 1st Mon in the month 3.30-4.30pm (Chatterbooks reading group for 7-11s), Wed 10am-12noon (Books & Biscuits coffee morning), 1st Fri in the month (Baby Time)
